scripts.worker:start: cd worker && source venv/bin/activate && python3 ieee_worker.py
scripts.cookie:refresh: cd cookie-refresh && source venv/bin/activate && python3 refresh_cookie.py
scripts.setup:worker: cd worker && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:cookie: cd cookie-refresh && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && playwright install chromium
scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:worker && npm run setup:cookie
